name: Debt Valet Driver
description:
Drive and park cars in SPACES as a valet drive to pay off your debt to society. Unlock upgrades to make things easier at the end of each day.

Made for GamesPlusJam 2 in 1 week!

Tips:

  • Damaging your car will reduce your earnings
  • If your car gets flipped, press F to flip back over
  • You gotta spend money to make money!

Controls:

On foot: 

  • WASD/Arrows let's to move

Driving:

  • W/Up Arrow:  accelerate
  • D/Down Arrow: reverse
  • W/A/Left /Right Arrows: steer
  • Space Bar: brake
  • E: enter/exit car
  • F: flip car upright
